svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light;

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 102px; height: 1px; padding-top: 5px; margin-left: 0px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #FFFFFF;

div.div: Led a team to success in a challenge by publishing an educational project on Wikiversity focused on computational genetics. (Used prize to fund driving lessons)

div.font: The job I once wanted proved less exciting: not a long-term option.
Spending the extra time studying project management, business improvement, and related.
